
{{alias}}( p )
    Returns the variance of a geometric distribution with success probability 
    `p`.

    If provided a success probability `p` outside of `[0,1]`, the function
    returns `NaN`.

    Parameters
    ----------
    p: number
        Success probability.

    Returns
    -------
    out: number
        Variance.

    Examples
    --------
    > var v = {{alias}}( 0.1 )
    ~90.0
    > v = {{alias}}( 0.5 )
    2.0

    See Also
    --------
